tweet: I’m pleased that @POTUS approved the request so that FL will have vital resources necessary to prepare for this intensifying storm. I encourage Floridians in the path of #Dorian to get prepared & stay informed! My office has prepared a list of resources➡️  http://bit.ly/2HKP3iT

.@VernBuchanan, @MarcoRubio, @SenRickScott, and I led a letter Thursday urging @POTUS to approve @GovRonDesantis’ request for a pre-landfall emergency declaration in preparation for Hurricane #Dorian.
